Who.1: Hi, I'm a passionate self-motivated web developer. I'm comfortable with React, Express.js, PostgreSQL and MongoDB. After a year of study, I am ready to contribute to the world in this new way, and I'm looking forward to bringing the best traits of a creative developer.

summary.1: Exclusive clubhouse where members can write anonymous posts. Inside the clubhouse, members can see who the author of a post is, but outside they can only see the story and wonder who wrote it.
summary.2: A front-end store built with React, React Router, and CSS. The store allows users to browse, add, and remove items from their cart.
summary.3: A front-end and back-end complex application for school related systems. After login, depending on roles /teacher, student, admin/ you can do certain actions such as adding teachers, classes, changing students or searching for personal information.
summary.4: In the future, web-based 3d applications will be a huge part of web environment. This is my experimental demonstration.
